pub.citation: Panero, J. L., Jasen, R. K. and J. A. Clevinger. 1999. Phylogenetic relationships of subtribe Ecliptinae (Asteraceae: Heliantheae) based on chloroplast DNA restriction site data. American Journal of Botany 86: 413-427.

pmmd.notes: One of 30 517 equally parsimonious Wagner trees (drawn as a phyllogram) of cpDNA restriction site data using 16 endonucleases. Thick lines denote branches that collapse in the strict consensus tree. Numbers of site changes shown above each branch; bootstrap values above 50 shown below the branches. Names in boldface represent members of subtribe Ecliptinae sensu Robinson (1981) . The cladogram has 1730 steps, a Consistency Index of 0.364 (excluding autapomorphies), and a retention Index of 0.776.
